 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשַׂע‎</span>] **verb** ==step, march== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסַע‎</span> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּסַע‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְשֳׂעָה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:10h»§ 10h</sup>) [[Isa.27.4|Isa 27:4]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> ***against.***.
